backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the app, defining data types (UserProfile, Place, Route, EmergencyProfile, SOS, Meetup, ActivityLog) and state maps, with mixins for blob storage and authorization/access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the end-to-end admin promotion flow fix, listing the affected frontend files and component dependencies with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing short summaries of all frontend source files, describing the purpose and key changes for each component, hook, page, and utility.
Manual smoke-test checklist for flyer download and sharing functionality, covering direct download, auto-export, link sharing, error handling, and quick share across desktop and mobile browsers.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens (background, foreground, primary, chart colors, sidebar, etc.).
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app titled 'My Brother's Keeper', mounting the app into a root div and loading the main TSX module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app component that sets up TanStack Router with all public, authenticated, and admin routes wrapped in appropriate guards, plus QueryClientProvider, ThemeProvider, and AdminPromotionHandler.
frontend/src/components/AdminPromotionHa: Invisible component that reads a stored admin token after login and calls the promoteToAdmin mutation once the actor is ready, then clears the token and shows a toast with the result.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI card shown when a non-admin user tries to access an admin page, with buttons to navigate home or to the places list.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminAccess: A dialog component that allows users to enter an admin token to gain administrator privileges, handling both authenticated and unauthenticated states by saving the token before login redirect if needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: A route guard component that checks if the current caller has admin privileges and renders either a loading spinner, an access denied screen, or the protected children accordingly.
frontend/src/components/auth/Authenticat: A route guard that protects pages requiring authentication, showing a loading state during initialization or a login prompt card if the user is not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: A button component that handles Internet Identity login and logout, clearing the React Query cache on logout and retrying login if the user is already authenticated.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: The main application layout component providing a sticky header, a responsive sidebar (desktop) and sheet menu (mobile) for authenticated users, a main content area, and a footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppNav.ts: A navigation component rendering links to main app sections and conditionally showing an Admin Dashboard link for authenticated admin users.
frontend/src/components/layout/BrandHead: The sticky top header displaying the app logo, emergency lookup button, admin access button, share button, and login/logout button.
frontend/src/components/maps/MapZoomCont: A settings control component that lets users select and persist their preferred map zoom level via a dropdown, stored using a zoom preference utility.
frontend/src/components/profile/Emergenc: A profile card component that generates, displays, copies, and rotates a local emergency access code, and shows the user's Principal ID for use in emergency lookups.
A form card component that allows users to save emergency profile information (next of kin and health conditions) tied to their stored access code, using a mutation hook to persist the data.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: A modal dialog that appears for authenticated users who have no profile yet, prompting them to enter their name to create an initial user profile.
frontend/src/components/profile/Verifica: A card component that lets users upload trucking license and ID proof documents for verification, displaying upload progress and current verification status (Not Submitted, Pending Review, or Approved).
frontend/src/components/share/FlyerPrevi: A forwardRef presentational component that renders a styled recruitment flyer for the app, displaying feature highlights and a shareable URL passed as a prop.
frontend/src/components/share/ShareDialo: A dialog component that provides options to share the app via native share, copy link to clipboard, view a flyer page, or download a flyer, navigating to the flyer route as needed.
frontend/src/components/sos/LastKnownLoc: A card that displays a one-time SOS location snapshot (coordinates and timestamp) with a Google Maps link, or a fallback message if no snapshot exists.
frontend/src/components/sos/PublicSOSCar: A public-facing emergency information view for first responders that shows driver name, next of kin, health conditions, and last known location using the LastKnownLocationCard component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, supporting both anonymous and authenticated (Internet Identity) actors, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing login/logout state via DFINITY's AuthClient and exposing identity, login status, and helper flags to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQrCodeCanvas.ts: React hook that generates a QR code onto a provided canvas element, tracking generation status (idle/generating/ready/error) with abort support and a 3-second safety timeout.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes React Query hooks for all backend interactions including user profiles, admin operations, places, routes, emergency profiles, and meetup locations using the useActor hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that configures Tailwind base/components/utilities and defines CSS custom properties for a light (asphalt/high-visibility) and dark (night highway) theme, plus two utility component classes.
frontend/src/lib/accessCode.ts: Utility module for generating, storing, retrieving, and clearing a 12-character emergency access code in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/adminPromotion.ts: Utility module for managing an admin token across Internet Identity login redirects, supporting save/retrieve/clear in localStorage and extraction from URL hash parameters.
frontend/src/lib/clipboard.ts: Resilient clipboard copy utility that tries the modern Clipboard API first and falls back to a deprecated execCommand approach, returning a boolean success indicator without throwing.
frontend/src/lib/eventType.ts: Provides a label-mapping function and an options array for all backend EventType enum values, used for display and filtering in the UI.
frontend/src/lib/fileValidation.ts: Validates uploaded files against a 10MB size limit and an allowlist of MIME types (JPEG, PNG, WebP, PDF), and provides a file size formatting helper.
frontend/src/lib/flyerExport.ts: Exports a flyer component as a PNG image by manually rendering its content onto an HTML canvas, including gradient background, text, and QR code elements.
frontend/src/lib/geolocation.ts: Wraps the browser Geolocation API in a promise-based function that returns latitude/longitude or rejects with a descriptive error message.
frontend/src/lib/googleMapsUrl.ts: Builds a Google Maps URL from latitude, longitude, and an optional zoom level.
frontend/src/lib/mapZoomPreference.ts: Persists and retrieves a map zoom level preference in localStorage, clamping values between 1 and 21 with a default of 15.
frontend/src/lib/meetupShareCode.ts: Generates, stores, retrieves, and clears a random 8-character meetup share code using localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/placeCategory.ts: Provides display labels and option arrays for the PlaceCategory enum, plus a helper to get a category's label string.
frontend/src/lib/principal.ts: Provides utilities to validate, safely parse, and convert Principal ID strings using the @dfinity/principal library.
frontend/src/lib/qrCodeGenerator.ts: Implements a standards-compliant QR code generator (ISO/IEC 18004) with Reed-Solomon error correction, Galois field arithmetic, and canvas rendering support.
frontend/src/lib/qrDownload.ts: Downloads an HTML canvas element as a PNG file by converting it to a Blob and triggering a link click, with validation for canvas readiness.
frontend/src/lib/quickShare.ts: Attempts to share a URL via the Web Share API and falls back to clipboard copy, returning a typed result indicating the outcome.
frontend/src/lib/shareUrl.ts: Returns the canonical absolute share URL for the application using window.location.origin.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Provides conversion utilities between JavaScript Date objects and nanosecond bigint timestamps, plus locale-aware date/time formatting functions.
frontend/src/lib/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities to get and remove URL parameters from both standard query strings and hash-based routing without triggering a page reload.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point that mounts the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AddPlacePage.tsx: A form page for authenticated users to add a new safe place, collecting name, category, location, and description fields, then submitting via the useAddPlace mutation.
frontend/src/pages/AddRoutePage.tsx: A form page for authenticated users to create and share a new route with start, destination, optional waypoints, date/time, and notes fields, submitted via the useCreateRoute mutation.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: An admin-only dashboard with tabbed views for registrations, verification reviews, SOS locations, and activity logs, using multiple data-fetching hooks and guarded by AdminRouteGuard.
frontend/src/pages/AdminReviewPage.tsx: An empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/pages/EmergencyLookupPage.t: A public page that allows emergency responders to look up a driver's emergency profile and SOS snapshot by entering their Principal ID and Emergency Access Code.
frontend/src/pages/FlyerPage.tsx: A page that displays a shareable app flyer preview with options to copy the share link or download the flyer as a PNG, supporting an auto-export query parameter trigger.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page for MBK Riders that displays hero section, feature highlights, and navigation buttons; redirects authenticated users to /places and includes an admin access dialog entry point.
frontend/src/pages/MeetupPage.tsx: Page for sharing and looking up real-time meetup locations; allows authenticated users to broadcast their GPS position with a share code and look up other riders' locations by principal ID or code.
frontend/src/pages/PlaceDetailPage.tsx: Detail view for a single safe place, looked up by URL-encoded name from the places list; displays location, description, category badge, and submitter principal.
frontend/src/pages/PlacesListPage.tsx: Searchable, filterable list of community-submitted safe places with category select and text search; authenticated users can navigate to the add-place form.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile page showing principal ID, verification status, admin badge, and sub-cards for verification uploads, emergency profile, and emergency access code.
frontend/src/pages/RouteDetailPage.tsx: Placeholder route detail page that only renders a back button and a stub message with no real content yet.
frontend/src/pages/RoutesListPage.tsx: Tabbed routes page showing the current user's shared routes and a lookup tab to search routes by principal ID; includes a RouteCard component and links to the add-route form.
frontend/src/pages/SOSCardPage.tsx: Displays the authenticated user's emergency SOS card by looking up their emergency profile using their principal and stored access code, showing a loading state or a setup prompt if data is unavailable.
frontend/src/pages/SOSPage.tsx: Provides an emergency SOS page where authenticated users can capture their current GPS location as a one-time snapshot and navigate to view their SOS card.
frontend/src/pages/UserAccountDetailsPag: Admin-only page that displays detailed account information for a specific user (identified by Principal ID), including profile, emergency profile, routes, places, locations, and activity log.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom OKLCH-based color tokens, border radii, animations, and plugins (typography, container-queries, animate) for the frontend design system.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking the current version, known issues (broken admin promotion flow), and existing feature requests focused on fixing end-to-end admin access.
